class.name: PLATEAUFilterCondition
class.brief_description: Filter condition for city objects by type and LOD.
class.description:
PLATEAUFilterCondition is used to filter which city objects to display or process based on CityObjectType bitmask, LOD range, and package type. [codeblock] var filter = PLATEAUFilterCondition.new() filter.city_object_types = COT_Building | COT_Road filter.min_lod = 1 filter.max_lod = 2
if filter.matches(mesh_data): # Process this mesh [/codeblock]

method.name: matches
method.description: Check if a mesh data matches this filter condition.

method.name: matches_type
method.description: Check if a city object type matches the filter.

method.name: matches_lod
method.description: Check if LOD is in the filter range.

method.name: create_all
method.description: Create a filter that matches all types.

method.name: create_buildings
method.description: Create a filter for buildings only.

method.name: create_terrain
method.description: Create a filter for terrain only.
